content:
Here's a markdown table with the automated formular prompts for the UI process:

| Step | Prompt | Keywords | Keyword Seeds |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Product Characteristics | What is your product? | Product | Software, App, Service, Gadget |
| Description | What is your product description? | Description | Overview, Explanation, Summary |
| Product Name | What is your product name? | Product Name | Label, Title, Naming |
| Brand Name | What is your brand name? | Brand Name | Identity, Image, Reputation |
| Logo Guideline | Do you want a guideline for logo? | Logo, Guideline | Symbol, Icon, Mark |
| - | Choose style for logo | Logo, Style | Modern, Classic, Minimalistic |
| - | Pick some logos you like (examples) | Logo, Examples | Inspiration, Preferences, Samples |
| Cl Guideline | Do you want a guideline for Cl? | Cl, Guideline | Layout, Color, Typography |
| - | Choose Cl style | Cl, Style | Bold, Simple, Eye-catching |
| - | Pick some Cl banners you like (examples) | Cl, Examples | Inspiration, Preferences, Samples |
| Banner Guideline | Do you want a guideline for banner? | Banner, Guideline | Size, Shape, Content |
| - | Choose banner style | Banner, Style | Dynamic, Static, Animated |
| - | Pick some banners you like (examples) | Banner, Examples | Inspiration, Preferences, Samples |
| Create Website | Do you want to create a website? | Website, Create | Online, Presence, Platform |
| - | Choose domain name | Domain, Name | Unique, Memorable, Short |
| Web hosting | Do you have a web hosting? | Web hosting | Space, Bandwidth, Server |
| Type of website | Choose your website type | Website, Type | Blog, Portfolio, E-commerce |
| Choose CMS platform | Choose a CMS platform | CMS, Platform | WordPress, Shopify, Wix |
| Website Guideline | Do you want a guideline for website theme? | Website, Guideline, Theme | Look, Feel, Design |
| - | Choose website theme | Website, Theme | Sleek, Professional, User-friendly |
| Language | What language do you want to output? | Language | English, Spanish, French |
| Amount of words | Choose by: 500-word, 1,000-word, 1,500-word | Amount, Words | Length, Content, Volume |
| Tone of voice | Choose tone of voice | Tone, Voice | Friendly, Serious, Humorous |
| Writing style | Choose writing style | Writing, Style | Formal, Casual, Conversational |
| Audience | Choose audience | Audience | Customers, Users, Prospects |
